Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleansing Cloths, Unscented

Brand: Cetaphil

Category: Makeup Remover

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dicaprylyl Ether, Decyl Glucoside, Phenoxyyethanol, Glycerin Oleate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Niacinamide, Panthenol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Sodium Bicarbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
